title: I didn't received a Hextech chest after my game, despite fulfilling all the condition to get one.
body: I had a S, I am no longer incuring a penalty after my ban (the message didn't displayed in chat), I didn't received any chests since at least a month and I haven't got any this season with the champion I played. Am I missing something?

replies.body: Is this regarding the account you're posting from or another?  In the meantime, something else may have been missed like needing to own the champion.  Check out our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide to rule out some possibilities, and let me know if this is still an issue.
It is from another, named Santozed and located in EUW.
It doesn't look like that account is eligible for mastery chests just yet.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can offer more context there!
